rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78428

self.title: CDISC CDASH Total Volume Administration Unit Terminology

definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC SDTM Unit codelist created for CDASH Total Volume Administration Unit codelist. (NCI)
name: Total Volume Administration Unit
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Total Volume Administration Unit Terminology

terms.definition: The unit of volume equal to one thousandth of a liter, one cubic centimeter, 10E-6 cubic meter, or approximately to 0.061 023 7 cubic inch.(NCI)
The unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram or 1000 micrograms. One milligram equals approximately 0.015432 grain or 35.274 x 10E-6 ounce.(NCI)
The unit of mass equal to one millionth of a gram or one thousandth of a milligram.(NCI)
